text: Langendorf railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Langendorf, in the Swiss canton of Solothurn. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Solothurn–Moutier line of BLS AG and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Langendorf: * Regio: ** hourly service between and . ** hourly service to ; limited service continuing to and . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Solothurn Category:BLS railway stations
title: Langendorf railway station
